item.description:
Extremely challenging times will soon be upon us, due to several situations which have reached a critical threshold. 

To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://www.krystalspiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm (2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)

This time we will be discussing Aquaponics as a source of food. One of our members brought up this topic previously, explaining how he currently uses his system set up in property which is rented.  That means you don't even need to be a home-owner to benefit from this GREAT idea!

For this meeting, your group organizer purchased a DVD called Aquaponics4You, which demonstrates everything you need to know to build your own system.  Unfortunately, the DVD appears to be defective so we won't be able to view it.

But we will be referring to some books when we discuss this topic at our usual meeting place, which is the Concord Cooperative Food Market.

As always, during the discussion period, members can ask questions about any other topic discussed previously, as well as offer suggestions for future Meetups.  If you know anyone willing to come and give a talk on any relevant topic, please say so!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Aquaponics: Step by Step Instructions to Build Your Own Aquaponics System
